event.title: 1836 three entrepreneurs named Dibble, Kingsbury and Kendall bought

data.event: In 1836 three entrepreneurs named Dibble, Kingsbury and Kendall bought 480 acres (1.9 km2) along the Thornapple River from Detroit banker Eurotas P. Hastings.

event.title: 1851, and a second paper, the Republican Banner, began

data.event: The first paper, the Barry County Pioneer, began publishing in 1851, and a second paper, the Republican Banner, began in 1856.

event.title: was incorporated as a village in 1855

data.event: Hastings was incorporated as a village in 1855, with a population of around 300, and on March 11, 1871, Hastings officially become a city.
Hastings was incorporated as a village in 1855, with a population of around 300, and on March 11, 1871, Hastings officially become a city.
The Barry County Courthouse, which is still in use today, was built in 1893.
The Barry County Courthouse, which is still in use today, was built in 1893.
